price: 79 Pharaon ordonna : « Faites venir tout ce que le pays compte d’habiles magiciens ! »
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu i'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ʿalīmin
